casebody.data:
Lunar, Appellant, v. City of Cleveland, Appellee.

[Cite as Lunar v. Cleveland (1994), 69 Ohio St.3d 673.]

(No. 93-1273 Submitted June 29, 1994 Decided July 27, 1994.) Nurenberg, Plevin, Heller & McCarthy Co., L.P.A, Andrew P. Krembs, David M. Paris and Joel Levin, for appellant. Sharon Sobol Jordan, Director of Law, and Malcolm C. Douglas, Assistant Director of Law, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on authority of Moskovitz v. Mt. Sinai Med Ctr. (1994), 69 Ohio St.3d 638, 635 N.E.2d 331, and the judgment of the trial court is reinstated.

Moyer, C.J., AW. Sweeney, Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. Wright, J., concurs in judgment only.
